message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a premium price of $150. I believe it holds significant value, but I'm open to discussing a fair deal.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
Bob, thanks for your interest! I understand your budget, but $80 is quite a bit below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $120?
I'm still a bit above my budget with your offer of $120. Would you be willing to go down to $90? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
